feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [WAW1][Network] - 2 switches version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 30, 03:30 - 05:30 UTC

Mar 24, 15:31 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/03/2022 03:30 UTC
End time : 30/03/2022 05:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement :We need to make a maintenance on PCC infra network

entry.title: [Global][PCC] - Maintenance upgrade host - wave 7
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 28, 20:05 UTC  -  Apr 2, 06:05 UTC

Mar 22, 20:13 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 01/04/2022 18:00 UTC
Description: : If you are from wave 7 you will receive a mail from us and you will be able to schedule again with the manager.
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Virtual machines will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If we meet an issue during the reboot of the host , it will be replaced. (20 min)

If major update have to be done, it will be two successive reboots like this:

Host v6.0 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.5 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.7 : upgrade minor to the last build 19195723 if needed, reboot
Service impact : None
Service improvement : All hosts have to be upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility and also due to the CVE

entry.title: [ERI][INFRASTRUCTURE] - E102D06
entry.content:
Mar 24, 10:50 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/03/2022 10:05UTC
End Time : 24/03/2022 10:15UTC
Technical impact zone:ERI
Service impact: Service is working as expected at this time.
Root cause : There was no more elec power supply on the servers. They have replaced defective power supply.

Mar 24, 10:35 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Mar 24, 10:32 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/03/2022 10:05UTC
Service impact : Servers are unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on. The are replacing defective power supply

entry.title: [SBG2A/RBX1A][Hosted private cloud] - Migration of MicroServices
entry.content:
Mar 22, 09:40 UTC
Completed - Due to an imponderable, we have to rollback the operation. We have not observed any impact. We will schedule a new intervention at a later date.

Mar 22, 09:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 17, 01:36 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/03/2022 09:00 UTC
End time : 22/03/2022 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact in production, only some connection timeout in the automation at the time of the intervention.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate the current hosted private cloud microservice from standalone container host to Kubernetes infrastructure.

entry.title: [RBX2][Hosted private Cloud] - Redundancy degradation
entry.content:
Mar 18, 05:10 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/03/2022 16:36 UTC
End Time : 18/03/2022 06:00 UTC
Comment :The incident is over, all tetes have been repaired.

Mar 17, 16:46 UTC
Update - Update: Services are slowly returning to normal, the tete that remains affected is: tete-3141b.

Mar 17, 16:45 UTC
Update - UPDATE: Services are slowly returning to normal, the tete that remains affected is: tete-3141b.

Mar 16, 09:29 UTC
Update - UPDATE: Services are slowly returning to normal, the tete that remain affected are: tete-3136b and tete-3141b.

Mar 16, 04:09 UTC
Update - UPDATE: 3139 is back in service again. polrad has been replaced . Progress of the repairs : 1/9

Mar 15, 19:06 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 15/03/2022 16h36 UTC
User impact : We encounter an incident impacting the backup link of Hosted Private Cloud storage services hosted on the following têtes: tete-3133a / tete-3135a / tete-3141a / tete-3298a / tete-3140a / tete-3137a / tete-3136a / tete-3139a / tete-3138a
There is no interruption or degradation on storage.
Ongoing Actions: Our teams are working to restore this backup-link as soon as possible

Thank you for your understanding

OVHcloud Technical team

End time : 17/03/2022 17:00UTC
